email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

We have a requirement for shipping 150,000MT of iron ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao. Could you provide your best freight rate and vessel availability for this shipment?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN TITAN, DWT 180,000, LOA 300m, for this shipment. Our starting freight rate is USD 18.50/MT on a CIF basis. Laycan is 20-25 October.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Thanks for the quick response. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you revise to USD 17.00/MT?

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
John,

We can adjust the rate to USD 17.50/MT, considering our long-standing relationship. This is our best offer.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

We accept your offer of USD 17.50/MT. Please confirm the laycan and send over the recap.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
John,

Confirmed. Laycan remains 20-25 October. Recap will be sent shortly.

Best regards,
Sarah
